# MultiQC

Now we use the *raw* results from FastQC to put into MultiQC to generate a combined quality score. 

To do this: 

1.  Go to Tools 
2.  Type in and select MultiQC 
3.  Under "Which tool was used" select `FastQC`
4.  Click "Insert FastQC output"
5.  Click "Browse or upload datasets" and select all of the "FastQC on dataset: RawData" - txt - files. 
6.  Click Run
